FuncRegressionUtils
public static
FuncRegressionUtils

Static utility methods related to the function regression family of tasks.

Functions
Probe
public static void Probe(
Func<double,double> fn,
ParamSamplingInfo paramSamplingInfo,
double[] responseArr
)

Probe the given function by taking samples of it at a number of discrete sample points.

Parameters
fn
Func<double,double>

The function to probe/sample.

paramSamplingInfo
ParamSamplingInfo

Sampling metadata.

responseArr
double[]

An array to store the sample results within.

CalcGradients
public static void CalcGradients(
ParamSamplingInfo paramSamplingInfo,
double[] yArr,
double[] gradientArr
)

Calculate an approximate gradient of a given function, at a number of discrete sample points.

Parameters
paramSamplingInfo
ParamSamplingInfo

Sampling metadata.

yArr
double[]

The function output/result at a number of discrete sample points.

gradientArr
double[]

An array to store the calculated gradients within.

CalcFunctionMidAndScale
public static void CalcFunctionMidAndScale(
Func<double,double> fn,
ParamSamplingInfo paramSamplingInfo,
out double mid,
out double scale
)

Determine the mid output value of the function (over the specified sample points) and a scaling factor to apply the to neural network response for it to be able to recreate the function (because the neural net output range is [0,1] when using the logistic function as the neuron activation function).

Parameters
fn
Func<double,double>

The function to be sampled.

paramSamplingInfo
ParamSamplingInfo

Parameter sampling info.

mid
out double

Returns the mid value of the function (halfway between min and max).

scale
out double

Returns the scale of the function.
